Text:
Hey, BB,
   newbie Redd again...don't know how to reach you directly. So thought wld  Comment everyday and hope you read one...Been everyplace I can think of trying to find his protege Rachel Maddows, still on msnbc....any chance you can get her on too? Thanks again,
Redd, of Phoenix.

You can download the Rachel Maddow Show with Juice formerly Ipodder from MSNBC.
http://podcastfeeds.nbcnews.com/audio/podcast/MSNBC-MADDOW-NETCAST-M4V.xml
http://juicereceiver.sourceforge.net/

indykarin listed the correct link for TRMS. When Keith was on MSNBC, you could get his video podcast via a similar link.

FYI: There are also RSS feeds for individual show segments for TRMS, The Ed Show, and The Last Word; they are, respectively:
http://rss.msnbc.msn.com/id/26548304/device/rss/rss.xml
http://rss.msnbc.msn.com/id/30012522/device/rss/rss.xml
http://rss.msnbc.msn.com/id/38865210/device/rss/rss.xml
